prompt: If you wanted to create a graph of the total area of these cities, what would be the best type of graph?
feedback: The best type of graph would be a bar or column graph. The area of each city would be indicated by a bar, and you could compare the bars to each other to see a visual representation of the cities’ relative sizes. A pie graph is inappropriate because the pieces of information on the graph aren’t parts of a whole. A line graph or scatter graph is inappropriate because there isn’t a second variable in the information. It’s not showing change over time or another relationship between two variables.
